game.name: Species: Unknown
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: “종: 미지의 세계”는 1~4인 협동 생존 호러 게임입니다. 버려진 배 위에서 정체불명의 생명체에게 쫓기며 위험한 임무를 완수하세요. 살아남고 장비를 업그레이드하며 어둠 속에서 기다리는 새로운 위협에 맞서 싸우세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Species: Unknown is a 1 to 4 players co-op survival horror. Complete high-risk missions aboard an abandoned ship while being hunted by an unknown creature. Survive and upgrade your gear to face each new threat that lurks in the dark.

reviewHighlights.text: very fun game with friends. but i wish there was more map variations and shuttles to choose from. if you watch this devs....add more places to go :) k...
